history.narrative: Law 18-361, the “Comprehensive Plan Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-867, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2010, and November 23, 2010 and January 4, 2011, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 20, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-711 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-361 became effective on April 8, 2011.
